capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid myself and he definitely seems like a grown man.

I'm not really sure about Hagrid's exact age, but I do know he's definitely an adult. He's been taking care of the magical creatures at Hogwarts for years now, and he seems to be doing a great job. I think he's probably in his mid-to-late 30s, but I wouldn't want to guess that exactly.
I'm not sure I'd call Hagrid's age exactly adult, but he is definitely well into his years. He's been taking care of those Hippogriffs for a long time now, and it shows in his rugged appearance.
